title: La meilleure mani√®re de...
overview: Sabine visits the website "suicidaire.be" every day under the pseudonym Eva B. In search of the famous book "Suicide, Mode d'Emploi" (Suicide: A User's Guide), which was censored a few years after its publication, she crosses the virtual divide and sets out to meet Barbie Turick, Dark Boy, and Odin in order to find the best way to end it all once and for all... painlessly!
